c74object.name: tap.thru~
c74object.description: In MSP, a continuous signal chain is not allowed to feedback into itself. If it is set up to, MSP simply won't perform the routine. In order to play with feedback techniques, the signal chain must be broken (typically using send~/receive~ or tapin~/tapout~). The tap.thru~ object does just that. It is particularly useful when working with matrix~.
